title: Pixel 5 - Proximity sensor visible when using Phone App and Telegram App
content:
Hi,

I just started using my new Pixel 5 and I've noticed that when I'm using certain apps (Phone and Telegram) the proximity sensor it's visible. It's this something expected or it's a problem with my phone? 

The phone was configured with a fresh install (no backup or cable was used) and Flip to Shh it's turned off.

Demo video with issue in Phone App
Demo video with issue in Telegram App
